abstract: The series has averaged about 13.5 million viewers, less than predicted but enough for a Fox executive to call the decision to renew it a “no-brainer.”
snippet: The series has averaged about 13.5 million viewers, less than predicted but enough for a Fox executive to call the decision to renew it a “no-brainer.”
lead_paragraph: Fox’s new singing competition, “The X Factor,” has won a second season. The network said Wednesday that it would bring the series back next year, potentially extending the scheduling pattern that features “X Factor” in the fall and “American Idol” in the spring.

headline.main: ‘X Factor’ Gets a 2nd Season on Fox
